title: Implement QuotedMessage component UI
description: Design and implement visual layout for QuotedMessage component with reply icon from lucide-react, sender type indicator (you/customer), truncated message content (max 100 chars), optional media thumbnail. Apply TailwindCSS styling with subtle background, border, and hover effect. Handle edge cases (deleted messages, empty content). Make responsive for mobile.
dod: Reply icon (CornerUpLeft from lucide-react) displayed on left
Sender type shown as 'You' or 'Customer' based on senderType
Content truncated to 100 characters with ellipsis if longer
If mediaUrl exists, show small media icon or thumbnail (24x24px)
Background color: subtle gray (bg-gray-50 or bg-gray-100)
Border: left border with accent color (border-l-2 border-gray-400)
Deleted message shows 'Original message unavailable' placeholder
Empty content shows 'Media message' if mediaUrl exists
Responsive design works on mobile (text-sm on small screens)
